title: Optimizing Camel-K Integration Build Time
description: Scaling the Camel K operator vertically to improve the integration build time.

title: K8s CI Bot Helper Job: automating `make update`
description: Check out the latest blog post on the Kubernetes website, which introduces the K8s Triage Bot Helper CI Job, a new tool aimed at improving the efficiency of issue triage and resolution in the Kubernetes community.
